Description: Indicates the number of checkpoints for this VM.
Indicates the number of checkpoints of this VM, the age of which is more than the AGE LIMIT configured for this test.
Interpretation: Use the detailed diagnosis of this measure to identify the aged checkpoints.

Description: Indicates the number of checkpoints of this VM that are of a size greater than the SIZE LIMIT configured for this test.
Interpretation: Use the detailed diagnosis of this measure to identify the large-sized checkpoints.
